sentences.en: Except for the rhythmic splash of the rudder oar, all was still.
sentences.cn: 水面静静的,只有那有规律的荡桨声打破了静夜的沉寂.

sentences.en: Frogs in the tangled grass croaked rhythmic accompaniment.
sentences.cn: 我在这片时中觉得心上比较平时恬静好些.

sentences.en: Good breathing is slow, rhythmic and deep.
sentences.cn: 健康的呼吸方式缓慢深沉而有节奏。
她的呼吸变得更有规律了.

sentences.en: I had been looking for ways to combine harmonic and rhythmic struc-tures.
sentences.cn: 我过去一直在寻找将和声和节奏结合起来的方法。

sentences.en: I had been looking for ways to combine harmonic and rhythmic structures.
sentences.cn: 我过去一直在寻找将和声和节奏结合起来的方法。

sentences.en: Its musical style includes irregular rhythmic patterns, vigorous bodily movements.
sentences.cn: 其音乐风格包括不规则的节奏模式 、 强有力的身体运动.

sentences.en: Matisse juxtaposes intense colors, varied patterns and a rhythmic line.
sentences.cn: 马蒂斯把强烈的色彩, 不同的图案和有节奏的线条放在一起.

sentences.en: music with a fast, rhythmic beat
The dull rhythmic tramp of the soldiers'boots formed the background to Goldstein's bleating voice.
sentences.cn: 士兵们战靴单调的踏击,衬托着戈德斯坦尖厉的叫嚣.

sentences.en: The perfect coordination of the dancers and singers added a rhythmic charm to the performance.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈演员和歌手们配合得很好,使演出更具魅力.

sentences.en: The rhythmic pulse is pervasive, but the possibilities of the style itself strictly limited.
sentences.cn: (它)充满了有节奏的拍子, 但是这种风格本身的可能性受到了极大的局限.

sentences.en: the rhythmic thud of the bass drum
sentences.cn: 低音鼓有节奏的咚咚声

sentences.en: These nerve centres generate rhythmic movements; or to be more specific, rhythmic stomach movements.
sentences.cn: 这些神经中心产生有节奏的运动，或者更确切地说，是有节奏的肠胃蠕动。

sentences.en: These rhythmic waves of muscular relaxation and contraction are called peristalsis.
sentences.cn: 这种肌肉舒张和收缩的有节律波动称为蠕动.

sentences.en: Up and down they go , endlessly, and endless as their toil rises their rhythmic cry.
sentences.cn: 他们不停地上上下下, 随着无尽的劳动响起有节奏的喊声:嗨,哟——嗬,嗨.

words.tran_cn: 使押韵；用韵诗表达；把…写作诗
[生物]有节奏的（等于rhythmical）；间歇的；合拍的

phrases.tran_cn: 艺术体操；韵律操，韵律体操

trans.tran_cn: 有韵律的，有节奏的，格调优美的，周期性的，合拍的
